Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This item not only serves its intended purpose but also adds a touch of elegance and functionality to your lifestyle. Considering its unique features and the time invested in its creation, I believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. I am offering it to you for $200, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
